backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing user-submitted messages keyed by caller principal with methods to submit, fetch one, or fetch all messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main pages and wraps them in the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedSto: Carousel component showing featured stories with navigation controls and links to story detail pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer displaying brand info, quick links including Terms, and optional social links with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, login/signup buttons, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app with a header, footer, and main content area using React Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryCar: Displays a story preview card with category, date, excerpt, tags, and links to the story page.
frontend/src/data/stories.ts: Defines the Story interface and provides a static list of story objects with metadata and content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmit.ts: Handles submitting contact messages through the backend actor with success and error state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a query hook to fetch all messages from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoriesFilter.ts: Filters stories by category and search query using memoized logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and utility layers for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, values, and creator sections for stories.pk using static text and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission plus static contact info and office hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, featured stories carousel, and CTA sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity, including redirect logic, login button, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides signup flow using Internet Identity with similar logic to login, including redirects and errors.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Lists all stories with search and category filtering and renders results using StoryCard components.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full story by slug with header metadata, body paragraphs, and navigation, and shows a not-found state if missing.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page using a card layout with multiple policy sections and contact info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
